Description_lang: Designate another player to bond with, becoming their Guardian for $394457d.While bonded, you and your ally gain ${$382280s1*(1-$382280s3/100)} Versatility and restore ${$382280s2*(1-$382280s4/100)} health per second. If you are within 15 yards of one another, these bonuses are increased. $?(a137012|a137024|a137031|a137032|a137029|a137039|a356810)[][|CFF808080Valid only for healer specializations.|R]
